mapper.select: select d.id, s.classno, s.termid, s.trainlevelid, s.majorid, c.coursename, d.teacherid, u.name as teachername, d.teachlocid, d.teachdate, d.teachsessid from t_course_detail d, t_course c, t_user u, t_class s where d.courseid = c.id and c.classid = s.id and d.teacherid = u.id and d.teachdate=#{teachdate} and d.teachsessid=#{teachsessid}
mapper.insert: insert into t_course_detail(courseid, teacherid, prime, teachtypeid, teachdate, teachlocid, teachsessid, teachcontent, create_time) values(#{courseid}, #{teacherid}, #{prime}, #{teachtypeid}, #{teachdate}, #{teachlocid}, #{teachsessid}, #{teachcontent}, now())
